content.text: On July 10, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with 14 new pull requests, of which 9 were merged. The repository also received 1 new issue during this period. A total of 9 active contributors participated in the repository's development on this day.
PR #5506 titled 'Add planning plugin' by @lalalune is open, introducing a new planning capability to the system.
PR #5510 titled 'feat: training models on own data' by @lalalune is open, enabling users to train models on their own datasets.
PR #5509 titled 'Add vision (camera and screen)' by @lalalune is open, adding visual perception capabilities to the system.
PR #5507 titled 'Add @elizaos/test-utils' by @lalalune is open, providing testing utilities for the ElizaOS framework.
PR #5436 titled 'feat: add action chaining' has been completed, allowing sequential execution of actions in the system.
PR #5501 titled 'fix: improve secret panel UX for global environment variables' has been completed, enhancing user experience for managing sensitive configuration.
PR #5519 titled 'feat: enhance Claude code review workflow with ElizaOS-specific guidelines' has been completed, improving the code review process with tailored guidelines.
PR #5516 titled 'fix typo in prompts.ts' has been completed, correcting a typographical error in the prompts file.
PR #5515 titled 'fix: CLI tests failing due to version mismatch and ActionResult import' has been completed, resolving test failures in the command-line interface.
PR #5514 titled 'fix: update plugin-starter dependencies to use workspace version' has been completed, standardizing dependency management for plugin starters.
PR #5513 titled 'fix: remove deleted directories from docs build config' has been completed, cleaning up the documentation build configuration.
PR #5512 titled 'fix: update TypeScript return types for strict compliance' has been completed, improving type safety throughout the codebase.
PR #5511 titled 'Remove AGENTS.md file' has been completed, removing an outdated or unnecessary documentation file.
Issue #5518 titled 'Knowledge Plugin: Lots of type errors since updating to eliza-1.2.0' by @borisudovicic is OPEN
